product_description: Pink color women watch, with 2 cm white dial, surrounded by pink stones with time minute and hour hand in black color without any numbers or romans inside.

copy_data.primary_copy: Elegantly minimalist pink timepiece adorned with sparkling stones. Where style meets simplicity for the modern woman.
copy_data.headline: Time Blooms in Pink Perfection
copy_data.description: Make a statement with this stunning pink watch featuring a pristine white dial and dazzling stone accents. Minimalist design meets maximum impact.

claude_optimized_prompt: Photorealistic close-up of an elegant pink women's watch with white dial and crystal stones, placed on a marble vanity next to delicate pink roses, soft natural lighting from left, shallow depth of field, lifestyle composition with negative space, high-end fashion photography style, 8K quality

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A photorealistic close-up of an elegant pink women's watch with a white dial and crystal stone accents. The watch is placed gracefully on a marble vanity surface beside delicate pink roses, creating a luxurious and elegant atmosphere. The soft natural lighting comes from the left, highlighting the intricate details of the watch. The shallow depth of field blurs the background discreetly, enhancing the spotlight on the watch and roses. This lifestyle composition offers ample negative space and is styled in a high-end fashion photography manner. The image is captured in 8K quality for utmost detail and sophistication.
image_generation_result.original_prompt: Photorealistic close-up of an elegant pink women's watch with white dial and crystal stones, placed on a marble vanity next to delicate pink roses, soft natural lighting from left, shallow depth of field, lifestyle composition with negative space, high-end fashion photography style, 8K quality
